attributes.action: make all televised live sports of british interest available to everyone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being able to watch live sports of national interest is impossible without getting access to SKY SPORTS. It is also unfair for eg. a cricket fan to subscribe to SKY SPORTS for a month of football, or a rugby fan for a week of golf. A channel should be made available on 'Digital Freeview' where viewers can be given the option to pay & view the individual international matches/competitions of their choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
